segments.text: Are you feeling better today , Bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's hard to say . I cough a lot in the evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better give up smoking . It's bad for your health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right , but you know , it's hard to give up an old habit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you should make up your mind first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , I often have to work till late at night . I need something to keep me awake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you go to bed and get up early ? You'll have the same time for work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your advice ! I'll try it .
segments.speaker: S2
